trans-unit.source:
\n

Provides data for the state change event of a .NET Framework data provider.

\n
trans-unit.target: $x$x$Xxxxxxxx xxxx xxx xxx xxxxx xxxxxx xxxxx xx x .XXX Xxxxxxxxx xxxx xxxxxxxx.$$x$$x

trans-unit.source:
\n

Gets the new state of the connection.
trans-unit.target: $x$x$Xxxx xxx xxx xxxxx xx xxx xxxxxxxxxx.

trans-unit.source:
The connection object will be in the new state already when the event is fired.

\n
trans-unit.target: Xxx xxxxxxxxxx xxxxxx xxxx xx xx xxx xxx xxxxx xxxxxxx xxxx xxx xxxxx xx xxxxx.$$x$$x

trans-unit.source:
\n

Gets the original state of the connection.

\n
trans-unit.target: $x$x$Xxxx xxx xxxxxxxx xxxxx xx xxx xxxxxxxxxx.$$x$$x
